description: Example settings for projects using claude-daemon plugin

notes.permissionMode: Options: 'ask' (prompt for each action), 'acceptEdits' (auto-accept edits), 'acceptAll' (auto-accept everything)
notes.allowedTools: Glob patterns for allowed operations. Use * for wildcards.
notes.deniedTools: Explicitly denied operations take precedence over allowed ones.
notes.usage: Copy this file to your project root as .claude/settings.json and customize as needed
